data.title: Shutdown: US 'Days' from Causing Worldwide Economic Disaster, says World Bank - ”If this comes to pass, it could be a disastrous event for the developing world, and that will in turn greatly hurt developed economies as well.“

A pleasant surprise: Indian Government handled Cyclone Phailin extremely well. Over 9 million in the path of the storm, only 14 deaths. Previous cyclone of similar magnitude in 1999 killed over 10,000 in the same region

Tens of thousands of mainly young Israelis protest against hardliners opposed to peace with the Palestinians and mourn peace-seeking prime minister Yitzhak Rabin.
